item.title: Design 3.0 Forum
item.description: DESIGN 3.0 FORUM New design paradigms for the next generation of design research Programme Introduction by Dr. Ki-Young Nam, KAIST Congratulatory Remark by Prof. Kun-pyo Lee Professor Rachel Cooper, Lancaster University | Context-setting for the theme: Design for Public Sector and Social Innovation Professor Martyn Evans, MMU | design for policy Dr. Edward Hyunwook Hwangbo, PDR | design for policy Dr. Pierre Levy, TU Einthoven | interaction design for society
